currentDoc: When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the "Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid

Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it wa

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the "Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. 

Side effects include paranoia, schizophrenia, and a complete inability to distinguish between fantasy and reality. Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Side effects include paranoia, schizophrenia, and a complete inability to distinguish between fantasy and reality. Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. They may have found

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the "Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. 

Side effects include paranoia, schizophrenia, and a complete inability to distinguish between fantasy and reality. Side effects include paranoia, schizophrenia, and a complete inability to distinguish between fantasy and reality. Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately, working while beer brewing companies, they found a way to really speed up this proces

Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately, working while beer brewing companies, they found a way to really speed up this process to make it a 2 month process now. After many clinical trials

Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately, working while beer brewing companies, they found a way to really speed up this process to make it a 2 month process now. After many clinical trials were a success, they have started to mass produce the cure.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the "Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. 

Side effects include paranoia, schizophrenia, and a complete inability to distinguish between fantasy and reality. Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately, working while beer brewing companies, they found a way to really speed up this process to make it a 2 month process now. After many clinical trials were a success, they have started to mass produce the cure. 
The cure is a drink that must be taken at exactly midnight of the person's birthday.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the "Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. 

Side effects include paranoia, schizophrenia, and a complete inability to distinguish between fantasy and reality. Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately, working while beer brewing companies, they found a way to really speed up this process to make it a 2 month process now. After many clinical trials were a success, they have started to mass produce the cure.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the "Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. 

Side effects include paranoia, schizophrenia, and a complete inability to distinguish between fantasy and reality. Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the "Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. 

Side effects include paranoia, schizophrenia, and a complete inability to distinguish between fantasy and reality. Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately, working while beer brewing companies, they found a way to really speed up this process to make it a 2 month process now. After many clinical trials were a success, they have started to mass produce the cure. 
The cure is a drink that must be taken at exactly midnight of the person's birthday.
 Which isn't the issue, the issue is that people need to stop taking the pill. The pill had an additive quality to it. So doctors, the army, and police rounded up all the peop

Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately, working while beer brewing companies, they found a way to really speed up this process to make it a 2 month process now. After many clinical trials were a success, they have started to mass produce the cure. 
The cure is a drink that must be taken at exactly midnight of the person's birthday.
 Which isn't the issue, the issue is that people need to stop taking the pill. The pill had an additive quality to it. So doctors, the army, and police rounded up all the people taking it and dropped

Side effects include paranoia, schizophrenia, and a complete inability to distinguish between fantasy and reality. Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately, working while beer brewing companies, they found a way to really speed up this process to make it a 2 month process now. After many clinical trials were a success, they have started to mass produce the cure. 
The cure is a drink that must be taken at exactly midnight of the person's birthday.
 Which isn't the issue, the issue is that people need to stop taking the pill. The pill had an additive quality to it. So doctors, the army, and police rounded up all the people taking it and dropped them onto an island by th

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately, working while beer brewing companies, they found a way to really speed up this process to make it a 2 month process now. After many clinical trials were a success, they have started to mass produce the cure. 
The cure is a drink that must be taken at exactly midnight of the person's birthday.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the "Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. 

Side effects include paranoia, schizophrenia, and a complete inability to distinguish between fantasy and reality. Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately, working while beer brewing companies, they found a way to really speed up this process to make it a 2 month process now. After many clinical trials were a success, they have started to mass produce the cure. 
The cure is a drink that must be taken at exactly midnight of the person's birthday.
 Which isn't the issue, the issue is that people need to stop taking the pill. The pill had an additive quality to it. So doctors, the army, and police rounded up all the people taking it and dropped them onto an island by themselves with tons of food and water and doctors administering the cure.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the "Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered. 

Side effects include paranoia, schizophrenia, and a complete inability to distinguish between fantasy and reality. Hearing voices and seeing things that are not there is only one of the serious side effects also though. The more serious side effect is that, for some strange reason, you start to age backwards while remaining paranoid, and schizophrenic. 

This is a huge problem because as you age backwards, your mental state will also age backwards. Meaning you start to become more and more immature, until you become an infant and eventually turn back into a fetus and die because you body can't support itself anymore.

Many people have already experienced this and doctors have been racing against the clock to stop the process.   It is later discovered that the drug was (in part) created by a mad scientist who is now dead, and it was his intention to destroy society. 

Doctors have found his notes, and found a cure for it also. Problem was that it was going to take 20 more years to brew a potion that would stop the side effects of the pill. Fortunately, working while beer brewing companies, they found a way to really speed up this process to make it a 2 month process now. After many clinical trials were a success, they have started to mass produce the cure. 
The cure is a drink that must be taken at exactly midnight of the person's birthday.
